data.text: @readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @Tara_Swanigan @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz Because… after 65+ studies by the NIH, the science says masks were harmful or made no difference. My wife is a doctor… showed me the research… much like the Black Plague, genetics had more to do with survival. Your damn mask is worthless, unless you wear a full face respirator

@readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @Tara_Swanigan @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz He was old enough to be your father. If it wasn’t Covid it was gonna be something else sweetie

@Stevennorthern1 @readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz Died from trying to save others. He was a respiratory therapist. And she is my friend.  Check the context before you spew bullshit. ✌🏼

@wwb99 @readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz Hey Wayne. This you? No sympathy for other illnesses other than your gut problem? Maybe when you’re feeling better you won’t speak ill of the dead or harass grieving widows. Best to you. 💁🏼‍♀️ https://t.co/mEWF9IyLcS

@Tara_Swanigan @readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz She's advocating for PPE that didn't work for him be worn by everyone to "protect" people. It's lunacy regardless of the situation.

@malodorouscarny @readingswan @MarkedByCovid @SurvivorsChange @TogetherWeMask @CTZebra @Cleavon_MD @kdurquiza @covid_loss @LostToCovid @USofDisaster @jritzsullivan @Jerri3dz You should really know your context before commenting. He was a respiratory therapist. He did wear a mask. What you’re doing is shaming a dead man whose wife and children miss hi tremendously. He lost his life caring for others.
